Mandate: Protect Zambia from external threats, assist civil authorities during emergencies, and safeguard infrastructure.
TopPriorities: Secure mineral-rich borders and Copperbelt transit corridors.
Support humanitarian logistics for flood relief and energy infrastructure.
Cooperate with regional defense forces on cross-border crime interdiction.
ActiveOperations: Joint patrols with the Zambia Revenue Authority along the DRC border to fight illicit copper smuggling.
Logistics support for the Ministry of Health vaccine cold chain.
Intelligence sharing with Zambia Police Service on organized crime groups that fund illegal mining.

RecentActions.Title: Deployed engineering units to repair electricity feed near Kitwe
RecentActions.Summary: Military engineers worked with ZESCO and civil contractors to restore feeder lines that mining auditors flagged as tampered with.

RecentActions.Title: Hosted Southern African Defense Transparency Forum
RecentActions.Summary: Shared best practices for civilian oversight and budget compliance while inviting ZRA auditors to participate.

KeyPartnerships: Southern African Development Community (SADC) standby forces

Metrics.TransparencyReviews: 3 field audits by Ministry of Defense
